titles.title: A bill to require the President to submit a report to Congress under the War Powers Resolution whenever members of the Armed Forces are paid hostile fire pay in an area declared a hostile fire zone by the Secretary of Defense.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

committee.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 10/21/1988--Introduced. Requires the President to submit a report to the Congress under the War Powers Resolution whenever members of the armed forces are paid hostile fire pay in an area declared a hostile zone by the Secretary of Defense.
